page.title: 13PUBLIC TRANSPORT
page.content: TRANSPORT The availability of public transport in this area is very limited.Because of this most people have a car.The nearest railway station is at Penkridge,so not many people travel by train. Bus services do run through our area.Service 5 runs from Cannock to Telford stopping at 12 stops.Two of them are Brewood and Gailey.These run on Thursday only,one bus each way.Services 877/878 both run through our area,3 buses each way from Monday to Saturday.This service is called the Green Bus Service. People travel for many reasons.Some are shopping,work and lesiure.But strangely there are not many petrol stations in the area.There are only 2. Both are on the A5.One at Gailey and one at the top of Horsebrook Lane.
